function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Shortage of medical staff due to increased demand for services","Impact":"Inability to meet the medical needs of COVID-19 patients and other patients, leading to reduced efficiency and increased risks","Mitigation":"Recruitment of more medical staff, remote healthcare solutions, and automation of certain processes","Technologies":"Smart technologies, telemedicine, and smart robots","People":"COVID-19 patients, other patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Shortage of necessary resources such as ventilators, intensive care units, and protective equipment","Impact":"Inability to provide necessary care and treatment, increased risks to patients and healthcare workers","Mitigation":"Procurement of additional resources, resource allocation optimization, and predictive resource management","Technologies":"Predictive analytics, resource optimization software","People":"COVID-19 patients, other patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"},{"Description":"Physical contacts between healthcare workers and patients","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, higher chances of cross-contamination","Mitigation":"Use of smart technologies for remote diagnosis and treatment, implementation of telemedicine services, and automation of healthcare processes","Technologies":"Smart technologies, telemedicine, automation systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government health agencies"}]}
